I am a physician (rheumatology and clinical pharmacology) and clinical
data scientist. Aside from my clinical work, I am the Data Science Lead
in the Medicines Optimisation Service at Austin Health and a PhD student
at the University of Melbourne, studying applied machine learning in
pharmacovigilance.
